About Salta

GENERAL INFORMATION

The Province of Salta is located in the Northwest of Argentina. It limits with 3 countries and 6 Argentine provinces:
- To the North: with the province of Jujuy and Bolivia.
- To the East: with Paraguay and the provinces of Chaco and Formosa.
- To the South: with Santiago del Estero, Tucumán and Catamarca.
- To the West: with Chile.

INTERNATIONAL LAND ACCESS

From Bolivia, through the border crossing points of: Puerto Chalanas (Aguas Blancas and Bermejo), Salvador Mazza - Yacuiba, El Condado - La Mamora (Los Toldos annd La Mamora) and Aguas Blancas-Bermejo.

From Chile, through the border crossing points of: Sico (San Antonio de los Cobres) and Jama (San Pedro de Atacama).

NATIONAL AND ACCESS

- From Buenos Aires: NR 34 / NR 9
- From Iguazú: NR 16
- From Córdoba: NR 9
- From Tucumán: NR 9 / NR 40
- From Jujuy: NR 9 / NR 34

ACCESS BY AIR

The Martin Miguel de Güemes International Airport is located in the city of Salta, it operates during 24 hours, the whole year round:
- Flights from Córdoba and Iguazú.
- Flights from Buenos Aires.
- Flights from Rosario de Santa Fe.
- Flights from Mar del Plata.
- Flights from Usuahia.
- During summer International charter flights from Brasil and Chile.
- Federal flight: Bariloche-Mendoza-Salta-Iguazú.
- International flight to: Santa Cruz de la Sierra - Bolivia.
- International flight to: Lima - Perú.

CLIMATE

The climate is defined as Highland Subtropical with a dry season. The days are warm and the nights are agreeably cool. The dry season enables you to enjoy sunny winters and low humidity summers. On the other land, as higher lands are reached, the thermal range between day and night becomes more marked.

USEFUL TIPS

Many touristic circuits travel through nonpaved roads. In this case, it is important to take into account that there can be windings roads and, on many tracks, there ir gravel, fact that allows an average speed of 50km/h, enjoying the surroundings landscapes.

FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THE WEB

In order to plan your visit to Salta, please check our website www.turismosalta.gov.ar and find all the information about tourist offers, or check your travel agency.
